c74object.name: sy.rot
c74object.description: Circularly rotates the characters of incoming symbols.

objarg.name: shift
objarg.description: Sets the initial value for the shift attribute.

method.name: anything
method.description: If global is set to 1 (default), the characters of the whole input list are circularly rotated of a certain amount, defined by the shift attribute. If global is set to 0, each individual incoming symbol will have its characters rotated by the defined amount, but the global order of symbols will not be touched. Finally, the result is output.

method.name: bang
method.description: Perform the rotation on the most recently received input symbols.

attribute.name: listin
listout
maxdecimals
attribute.digest: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of decimals to be used for the conversion from number to symbol, in case the numbers attribute is set to "Convert To Symbol".

attribute.name: label
attribute.value: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion

attribute.name: numin
numout
shift
attribute.description: Number of characters to rotate the incoming input of. Positive numbers rotate left, negative numbers rotate right.
